introduction: Here you can download summary reports drawn from the epidiemological data.

reports.name: Public Health Profile Report
reports.introduction: This report summarises the state of public health in the selected location.

reports.name: Communicable Disease Profile
reports.introduction: This report summarises the state of communicable disease public health in the selected location.

reports.name: Non-Communicable Disease Profile
reports.introduction: This report summarises the state of non-communicable disease public health in the selected location.

reports.name: Communicable Disease Report
reports.introduction: This report tracks the spread of communicable diseases across the selected location.

partners: The Ministry of Health, Null Island
